message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is cutting it too close to my minimum. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I'm willing to go up to $12,500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your valuation.
